title: 50 Shades of Ink: Victoria gallery takes a new look at an ancient art
description: Art Gallery of Greater Victoria exhibition featuring rarely seen ink paintings and historical tools

title: Wisconsin lake reveals ancient vessels that predate Egyptian pyramids
description: Archaeologists in Wisconsin have unveiled a vessel-based, e-bike-like system dating back thousands of years at a local lake.

title: 50 Shades of Ink: Victoria gallery takes a new look at an ancient art

title: DNA confirms modern Bo people are descendants of ancient Hanging Coffin culture
description: In a recent study, researcher Dr. Hui Zhou and his colleagues conducted a genetic analysis of the genomes of individuals associated with the ancient Hanging Coffin tradition in Southeast and Southern Asia. In addition, they sequenced the genomes of modern-day Bo people to determine their genetic relationship to the ancient Hanging Coffin practitioners.

title: Dozens of ancient coins sent to Nangarhar museum
